title: Sending Off ‘Succession’ With Showrunner Jesse Armstrong | The Watch (Ep. 280)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald unpack the season finale of ‘Succession’ (2:00) before welcoming on its showrunner, Jesse Armstrong, to discuss the joys of creating an entertaining season of television with rich characters (31:00).
